rows.label: tlk44300184_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Damn it all to hell...
Why now... Why now...?

rows.label: tlk44300184_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I used to have a shop here, but
then it closed down for a while.

rows.label: tlk44300184_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Now some Nopon from Avaritia
came and asked me to open up anew,
and I was just making preparations.

rows.label: tlk44300184_03_msg0004
rows.name:
And now, these damn Divine Beasts fighting...
But I won't give up! I'll open the shop,
if it's the last thing I do!
